content.detailedDescription: While riding back seat on my way from florida to georgia, on i-75n, we ran into a quick storm. after the rain slacked up, i thought i saw a tornado forming so i (ended game i was playing on my tablet) started to record. then i noticed two (2) shining, star like objects moving around in the clouds. i tried to focus on them, but thought maybe it might be from the window(spots,reflections), so i moved the tablet a little just to see if they moved or stayed in one place. i also recorded while trying to look with naked eye, but they disappeared. later on, after i watched the video, i could see how they cloaked in the clouds, and that there was an even bigger one hovering up above them (2) to the left. it is kind of hard to see, but it is the classic saucer shape. i also could see in the lower right, what appeared to be a red star. i have since made a you=tube video of said event. i do testify that what i have stated
content.summary: Riding from florida to georgia on i-75n, about 8:20pm, saw objects and filmed them.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I live with pet cats at the top of an old former factory building, near a fairly scruffy looking part of the ct shoreline. i have a good view of the river below me and the local interstate to the west. i've been here for over four years now, and work at home, so i am used to the area and its traffic (cars, planes, boats, motorcycles, dirt bikes, emergency vehicles). it is working-class industrial. there is a power company building not far away to the west. we get some small ship traffic here, twice-daily fishing boats and occasional tug boats, and i like to observe them. the tug boats stop at the small commercial shipyard across from me, before they go back out to long island sound to do their work. we have lots of industrial lighting all along the river. i like the scene out there, and when at loose ends i look for anything interesting, especially moving ships that i can identify and look up online on the live ships map.

well, i happened to look out about 9:40 in the evening last night. i had just called my mother and said good night to her a few minutes before. this particular night was very dark, with just a little stringy cloud; summing up as a very black sky for around here, even with all the industrial shoreline light pollution and resulting glare.

i spotted a large white light (i will call it “light 1”) that seemed to float out in the near distance (maybe 1/4 mile away). i played my usual game of what is it? i quickly realized it didn't fit what i expected to see out there---didn’t quite fit in, you might say. it was too high to be a smokestack marker or similar orientation light, and all of those around here on top of buildings have to be pulsating lights, because there is a small airport very nearby, to the ne, so the planes need warning lights for any possible high obstacles to be encountered above the treeline. (i am on the airport's approach path, so i see small craft circling to land all the time, although the runway itself is totally out of my sight, beyond the treeline.)

i watched the oddball white light to see if i could figure it out---was it coming from a building? from on top of a building? etc., and then tried to orient my eyes to stationary lights around it, to see if it was actually moving, but just very slowly. turns out, it was moving. and yes, rather slowly.

this light ("light 1") came toward my relative direction at this slow and steady pace. i noted that it was one large white light, no pulsation of any kind, no orientation lights such as would be evident for airplanes or helicopters. i listened for a helicopter sound too (the river reflects sounds very well, boosting anything, land or sea or air; however, helicopters themselves are uncommon at my location, and if they do come by, i can distinctly hear them---there is that distinct droning sound). well, no helicopter sound. i report no sounds of that kind to be heard, just the usual ambient car sounds.

after, say, at least two full minutes, another identical white light ("light 2") popped up in the same beginning position in which i had sighted the first (light 1). hmmm.

in the meantime, the original light (light 1) came toward my building, and when it was almost overhead, i saw that another light was above me (not directly, but almost directly) that didn't seem like an airplane, but which had a winking white light and at least one red light on it (i call this "light 4", because there were eventually three that came from the same direction, and this one, the fourth, was an exception in that respect). it blinked in and out of the cloud cover (so i am not positive it was actually itself blinking; it could have been floaty clouds making this effect), but still seemed to remain perfectly stationary. not progressing in position, in other words; actually still. i don't think this one was moving, slowly or otherwise. it was simply present.

the original white light i had spotted (light 1) moved on its course at level speed, and the second light (light 2) that had popped into sight proceeded toward this area too, but on a slightly different vector, eventually passing over my building. as i noted the journey of this second white light, i saw a third light ("light 3") pop up in the original location in the distance, and proceed at the same slow speed toward my building, but again, on a different vector from lights 1 and 2. i looked above to see where the hovering light with a red light was. i could not see it anymore, but can't be certain whether the clouds were simply covering it now.

i am of the impression that the three moving lights ascended in height gradually from their "origin point", but can't be certain. it just seems so to me. i would estimate, at their highest, they were slightly lower than light 4; reason being, i never saw cloud cover smear them in any way, whereas light 4 was slightly above the drifting clouds. (if i hadn't seen light 4, with "drifting stringy cloud" effect evident on its bottom "surface", i wouldn't have known there were any clouds, the night sky was so dark.)

i watched to see if another light would appear from the middle distance, that original spot out toward long island sound. none appeared. all three of the steady white, slowly moving lights, had simply taken their paths, each in their turn, silent and undisturbed, over my building on their slightly different vectors, and that was that. it took, i would estimate, about 10 minutes altogether. it's possible it started a few minutes earlier than i stated---i didn't mark the start time absolutely. i would estimate, at the very most, it would still have taken no more than 15 minutes for all this to transpire. after i was satisfied no more was to appear, i called my mother (i finally looked at the clock to make sure it wasn't too late to call her---it was just about 9:55 at this point) and told her all about it.

the "event" was over. nothing further showed up in the sky of any note that evening. also: the cats didn't seem to really care or notice. no weird vibes, in other words. were asleep a few feet away. i had the tv on low throughout, and service was not disrupted. in terms of my feelings about all this, i was intrigued, but not frightened, anxious, or excited. i’m not someone who “needs” to see ufos…i just thought this was singular, and wanted to report it.

now, on this same day, much earlier in the day, there had been an accident in that relative location out toward the harbor. around 10:00 that morning, a man had fallen from a bridge on the interstate when he was working on some kind of repair. he fell into the water, and had to be fished out. he survived, but sustained a heart attack immediately after he was rescued, and was in crisis. emergency crew had to be rushed in. he was taken to the enormous hospital complex that is about seven minutes from here. osha people were brought in to see if there were safety violations at the site. perhaps they came in by helicopter to view the bridge and surrounding area. (i didn’t see any sign of these during daylight, however.)

so it’s possible these lights were three helicopters leaving, in succession, from that spot. that would square with logic of a sort. however: i do not think there are any helipads there in that crowded gas depot area; they would be coming in from the airport, and these were not, imo, coming from there. and these lights seemed to originate at the point where they popped into my sight---they didn’t approach that spot from a distance. also, i saw no orientation lights for helicopters; i heard no helicopter noise. i’m just mentioning this out of fairness to the evaluation. the local newspaper, and our local tv station, each had an article online yesterday that will support the account of the incident at the bridge.
content.summary: Saw three bright lights moving above i-95. showed up one at a time, each moving separately from same "launch point", eventually numbering 3 such events. moved slow and steady from the same point but in slightly different vectors. saw a fourth above me.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i went out at midnight on new year's eve to watch fireworks welcoming the new year.  we saw a few fireworks, and then about five minutes after midnight we watched some unknown reddish-orange discs moving across the horizon above the tree line.  they made no sound and moved in unison towards the northwest.  at least five were in a straight line and there were a couple above and a couple below that line.  (six years have passed since the sighting, so the exact number escapes us). we jumped in the car to get in a clearer area to see if we might see where they were going.  by the time we got to a clearing, they were nowhere to be found.  my husband contacted mufon and we submitted a report.  someone called us a couple of weeks later.  they wanted to come out and take photos and see exactly where the sighting took place.  unfortunately, our brother-in-law was killed in a motorcycle accident in that time frame, so we weren't able to follow-up with the report. a lady at mufon told my husband that someone in houma, la had reported something similar within minutes of our sighting and was supposed to have some video footage.  about a month later my husband spoke with a man from texas who had taken over the case, but we don't see our case in the archives.
content.summary: Eight-ten unknown objects moving across the sky

content.detailedDescription: Me and my bother were hunting at our camp which was isulated,you had to walk into it at the time around 10 miles.We would go to this point at the mouth of a large size creek that came into the lake and hunt for ducks in the evening.It was getting around dusk when i felt an electricity feeling and looked behind me and just above the poplar trees there was this gigantic disk and told my brother to look and that is the last thing i remember until the next morning.We both woke up in our beds at the camp and didn't say a thing to each other about what happened it was only years later that we talked about it.The morning we got up it felt like we were in a haze,but we went out partridge hunting any way and the whole morning was unbelievable there were partridge everywhere like manna from heaven almost creepy.One thing i do remember is seeing this mountain beside a valley i thought i was in ,like flying through it but there are no mountains were  this happened just large hills.To this day i cannot remember from seeing the disk until the next morning.But that sucker was larger and silvery.
content.summary: Hunting looked behind because of humming noise big ufo hovering right behind me just above trees next thing me and my brother remember is waking up the next morning

content.detailedDescription:
June 16, 2015 9:50pm
i am on the florida mast team. we have been on alert for a few days, mast activation #15-004. this was the first evening i had the opportunity to observe with good visibility. our area had an intense thunderstorm late in the afternoon/early evening, but the skies were mostly clear by 9:30pm, so i decided to sit out. 

i was observing the night sky with my spouse, from our backyard, facing s. at appx 9:50 pm, a very bright light appeared in the southern sky, heading due n, directly towards us. i then noticed a second light just behind it, at an angle, to the left. my husband spotted a third light, just behind it, at an angle to the right. the 2nd & 3rd lights were very faint at first, but then increased in brightness until they were as bright as the 1st light. they traveled together, in a v formation, due n, then turned slightly onto a ne course. the lights began to dim when they reached 90 degrees, almost directly over our heads, then faded completely out of sight. the entire event lasted about 10 seconds. 

please note: we observed s/l 8 rb pass at appx 9:54pm, shortly after sighting. there were also 2 satellites in the e, but we couldn't see those with naked eye. 

we were very excited to witness this. i made some preliminary notes on the details of sighting, then reported sighting to florida mast director. we compared satellite charts for anything i may have missed. 

my husband & i sat outside until appx 11pm. he commented to me, several times after the event, that he felt like his energy was completely drained. he didn't move from his chair, didn't even have the energy to speak, which is very unusual for him. i experienced no adverse affects.
content.summary: 3 bright lights  traveling in v formation

content.detailedDescription: I was at home in bed. my bedroom door opened slightly and three very long fingers curled around the door from the outside of my room. i remember faintly seeing a tall bulbous-headed being. much of what happened afterwards seemed to be repressed and images and feelings slowly over the years return to me. the only other thing i remember from these experiences; because i believe i was visited several times, was standing in my backyard looking at a tall, slender, gray alien wearing a shiny metallic like clothing that glowed. i also remember the very moment i felt as if they were finished with me and i was back in my bed, still with the door slightly ajar, confused, scared, and nervous. through tarot and hypnosis i have come to believe that i was contacted 6-8 times. i believe i was extracted from, through my skull in at least 4 different spots on my head. i believe that they revealed themselves physically to me as a thank you for letting them extract "technology" from my skull. these realizations have just within the past few months become clear to me and finally like some kind of fog has been finally lifted from me. i know that other members of my family have also been contacted/abducted. i know that it has happened and happens to many people. i also feel as if they implanted me with something. it's hard to explain but after these events i felt as if my attributes had been diminished. i began to have strong feelings about being left behind. i began to have strange spatial feelings that was i closed my eyes and focused, i could project my immediate surrounding away from me so that i almost felt like i was far away from everything around me as if i myself shrunk down to the size of an ant. i've spent much of my life, for the most part, being somewhat anti-social, prone to anxiety in many situations, self sabotaging, and being consumed at different points in my life with ufology/exopolitics and also feeling like i'm spending my life waiting to be contacted again or for some event to bring clarity to why this happened to me and what's really going on here on earth. the only thing i can think to do is report this and just add to the cases and hopefully others who have been under a fog will come to and report their cases as well. i fear the clarity i desire may only be avalable to my children but i still hope.
content.summary: Contacted, abducted, and extracted from by gray aliens (2 or more)

content.detailedDescription:
Saturday, june 13th around 10 pm i was outside on my property with my son teaching him long exposure night photography. we noticed the iss coming from the southwest. we swung the camera around to its direction. i was shooting with a canon 5d mark iii with a 18-35 l glass lens on a manfrotto tripod. i shoot in raw format as well.
        when the iss was in the lenses field of view i pressed the shutter then went back to looking at the sky. we watched the iss moving fast and very bright. in the path of iss we saw a flash of light. i asked my son if he saw that, he said yes. as the iss continued towards the flash we saw it again in the same position only a bit higher. we could faintly see it moving higher as the station was approaching its position. it seemed to pulse as it was rising. it was dimmer in luminance then a satellite and then seemed to be gone, then flashed.
         once the iss passed the position of the flashes we stared at the sky but could no longer see the light. i scrambled it hit the shutter button again to take another photo. it was about 20 seconds later that i took another 30 second image. on the first 30 second image that i took you can see the streak of light from the iss and the movement of the stars. you can also see a pulsing dim light and we caught one of the flashes. there is no streak as the subject seems to be stationary but rising between pulses. there is also no movement in the flash.... i have the original untouched raw photos and still have the original images on the sd card...
 thank you for your interest...
thomas
content.summary: High res image of a flashing/pulsing light ascending in the path of the iss...

content.detailedDescription:
1. we were outside on the backporch sitting by the pool- listening to music

2. extremely bright light

3. flashlight in the sky

4. extremely bright orb came on very strong--lit up most of the sky for a total of 3 seconds. then slowly dimmed and proceeded to fly off.

5. speechless, shocked, excited, happy

6. treeline
content.summary: Extremely bright light

content.detailedDescription:
I remember when i was about 5-7 years old my mother father brother and i went to a christmas party everybody was having a good time band playing people dancing and some guy don't know who he was, called my father outside.My brother and i followed him and the guy was pointing up saying look at that.I asked my father what is it? and he said a flying saucer that's when i lost it.I started crying saying were going to die then i started to run toward home and my mother caught up with me, and she said its ok its not doing anything, its just sitting there. let me add i am still hysterical crying, trying to break free from my mother because she is walking closer to it to where we started from outside the hall. i guess i was trying to get further away from it.So we get back to where we started and their are more people outside looking  at this thing,(it was very large saucer shaped with lights going clockwise and my father said that one of the lights were out, you could not here nothing coming from it made no noise what so ever, it was just hovering there above  a police station)after about five minutes, it started to move slow so my father hade the good idea to follow it in the car, at this time i am starting to calm down probably because we are all in the car.My brother and i were both looking out the back window looking at it still following it.Then we came to a bridge we were going west and the ufo was going south and all of the sudden bam it took off like a bat out a hell!!!! and never saw it again

ps.This is not a hoax please feel free to call me to talk more looking forward to it.I can tell you guys the path we drove till we last saw it i don't know how to forward sketches or maps with computers sorry please call me and let me know if you guys got this report.I held my breath to long not saying anything  and the people i told pretty much thought i was crazy so it would be nice to talk to someone who cares like mutual ufo network.
content.summary: Family went to a christmas party,some guy called my father outside & my brother & i went with him, & there it was, a (ufo).

content.detailedDescription:
Around 9:30 am on june 9, 2015 i was headed southbound on us 95, after getting on the freeway at flamingo dr. in las vegas.  i was headed towards westbound 215 in henderson.  somewhere around tropicana, which is the next major street south of flamingo, i was looking into the sky above the horizon.  right around that approximate area is where what i believe the airspace is for mccarran international airport would exist, for planes to approach for a landing from the east.  this is one of the busiest airports in the world, and there is a lot of air traffic.  i tend to see planes fly in for a landing maybe 15 - 30 seconds apart all day long.  they follow the same basic flight path.  

i was driving alone on the freeway headed to go to a business meeting.  but i am always looking at airplanes flying in the distance or overhead.  i love to watch the planes so i usually look at them.  there is more than one flight path, but this particular flight path where i usually see a lot of planes is in the general direction just east of the airport, sort of between tropicana on the north and sunset on the south.   i had nothing else to focus my attention on but having my eyes on the road and look into the sky above the horizon.  the traffic was light.  there were no clouds at all in the sky, as typical for las vegas.  

then i noticed two small round or circular objects in the sky.  one was completely motionless or hovering.  the other one was moving horizontally to the west, away from the stationary object and towards the airport.  i thought that was rather odd because i never saw anything in that airspace during the daytime except airplanes.  they had no wings or other visible features.  

i sometimes see other airplanes flying much higher in the sky, usually from west to east, and they usually appear to be the same small size as these strange objects, but i can always recognize an airplane by its motion, size, and i think i can always see wings and a tail to recognize the shape of an airplane.  these objects were round, or possibly disc-shaped, and had no wings.  also, anything staying completely still in the air would not stay up in the air very long.  or so i thought to myself.  

so i first thought these might be airplanes, but as i continued to stare at them it occurred to me that they were not airplanes at all.  the one that was motionless did not change size, so it was not perhaps flying towards me or away from me.  both remained the same size and shape all the while i watched them.  but the one on the right was the only one moving, although not very fast from my perspective.

they had the same color.  sort of metallic color.  i couldn't tell how high they were because i could not determine the size.  i needed one of those two variables to judge either size or distance, or even speed.

i kept thinking how odd this was.  and having 2 objects the same size so close together instead of just one was even stranger.  i also thought that nothing should be within the airspace of mccarran.  i did think perhaps these might be small drones, the kind that hobbyists might use to mount a camera on to do photography, but even with that, i would doubt they would be allowed that close to a major airport.  

i am not sure how i lost sight of them, either i drove past and underneath where the objects were in the sky, putting me south of them, or they just disappeared from view, as fast as in the blink of an eye.  but since i had to keep my eyes on the road i am not sure how they disappeared.

they did not return, although i kept looking for more nor did i see these again.  i did not hear any sounds because i had my car windows rolled up and i was playing my car radio.  i did not see any lights or anything else strange about them.

the only things that were strange was their proximity to the airport, the fact there were 2 of them because airplanes do not travel in pairs, the way they had no wings, and one was stationery in the sky while the other one was moving in a path.  i think it was moving in a straight line, but i am not really sure because i kept trying to figure out what i was looking at, and steer the car at the same time.

sorry i don't have any sketches or photos or videos.  i would have had to pull off the road in order to get out a camera from my purse.  my camera probably would not have captured images of something that small either against the cloudless sky.
content.summary: Two round objects in mccarran intl airport airspace above us 95

content.detailedDescription: Brother-in law took a picture at fort erie bridge on the date above and didn't notice object until he got home to look at it. i
content.summary: Ufo by fort erie bridge

content.detailedDescription: On a pathway in my backyard i was walking northerly towards my house. i decided to stop and look at the westerly sky, because many stars were visible.  i did not see any airplanes in the sky.  within about 2 minutes of looking around the sky i observed a single big flash of light. the blink/flash lasted about half a second.  when i first saw the flash my first thought was meteor that burned out as soon as i saw it, but there was no glowing wake tail. and then within less than 5 seconds i see a 2nd flash of light at about same elevation but much further north, then a 3rd flash of light a few seconds later still further north (nw sky), then a 4th flash back towards south (wsw), and then after a gap of about 15 to 20 seconds a final 5th flash in the sse sky.  after waiting a minute with no further observations of light flashes i walked swiftly to retrieve my mobile phone.  i picked up my phone inside and quickly went back outside to view the sky.  i remained gazing at the sky for about 5 minutes, and  observed typical airplane traffic, 3 planes going different directions at different altitudes and at typical speeds, and all planes at much higher elevation above the horizon than the light flashes that i had observed minutes before. i was in awe of how fast the flash had moved across the sky. no airplane moves so quickly across the sky.  the international space station does not move this quickly across the sky or change direction with such agility. i thought, well, these 5 flashes of light could be more than 1 craft/object/entity, but my belief is that it was the same craft/object/entity. i have never observed anything like this before. no sound, just light, and amazing speed. i would like to know if any air traffic controllers in the area detected any super-sonic, near light speed aircraft on their instruments.
content.summary: 5 single blink big flashes of light within 1 minute period with directional changes and covering about 120 degrees of westerly sky

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of june 6,2015, around 10:15, i was letting my dog out into the yard and looked toward the sky as i waited for her.  i was looking directly eastward at a treeline about a quarter of a mile away, maybe half a mile, and from my perception, about 20-40 feet above the treeline and very slightly to the right of it, i saw an extremely large shape in the sky, very sharply pointed in the middle extremely long in its width, which all of a sudden just seemed to slowly appear.  it almost reminded me of an arrowhead or zig-zag chevron in its width, but the sharply pointed center looked like the two sides of a triangle.  in the middle of it, above the largely pointed center, was a round shape that almost looked like a dome.  i could not see the length of it as i was looking directly at it as it was heading west, and just could see the front and width of it, which was extremely large.  it was moving very slowly, not fast at all.

it is difficult to judge by measurement the size of what i saw without using the words huge or large.  if i stand in the same spot where i was standing when i initially saw it above the treeline about a quarter to half mile away and hold up a quarter at arm's length, then i would have to hold 3-4 quarters across to cover the width of it at that distance. 

as i continued to stare at it, i just froze and tried not to blink. i was stunned by what i was seeing. i then saw what looked like a hot sidewalk effect, for lack of a better description, or a waviness that began to encircle it, and then it looked as though piece by piece i could see through it until it would fade or melt into the sky - almost as though it was camouflaging itself in the night sky - only to reappear slowly again several seconds later.  if i hadn't been looking in its direction at the moment i did, i would have missed it, despite it being so large, because of the way it sort of fit in with the night sky when it would show itself.  as it came a little closer, i noticed lights from underneath it, but then i also noticed that it faded in, or disappeared, more frequently and that its shape became sort of lost or not as discernible as it had been.  what did become more discernible, however, were the lights underneath it.  by the time it was nearing my home, i saw one large circle with about 15-20 red globes of light within the circle.  i then realized the lights were underneath something, but the object was not discernible around or over the lights at this point. everything looked just really dark, but i knew it was there and i sensed it was there.  i'm not great at measuring distance, but the circle of lights was perhaps about 10-15 feet around, maybe a bit more, about 400-500 feet up.  it was totally silent.  i saw the circle of lights then move very slightly and slowly in a northwesternly direction above my home.  the lights did not move, but the entire circle moved with the lights inside it.  at this point, i became afraid and grabbed my dog.  i ran from my back door through my house to my front living room window as it faces north, to see if i could follow it, but when i looked out my front window it had disappeared.  it was just gone.

i live fairly close to a chicago airport (about 30 minutes south) and am very familiar with the sights and sounds of airplanes, whether they are flying high or low, daytime or nighttime, but this was not like anything i had ever seen before in the sky.  it didn't make one sound, and was very large.  there are always planes flying in their flight paths over my neighborhood and my home, but strangely enough, there wasn't one plane in sight during that time that i could see or that i could hear.  just silence.  my husband and son were not home at the time, and i did not have my cell phone on me when this occurred as i was just letting my dog out and had left it in the house - never imaging that i would be witnessing something like this - so unfortunately, i can only tell you what i saw with my own eyes.

after telling my husband and son about my experience, my son showed me pictures of a stealth bomber, which was not what i saw in the sky.  they also showed me pictures of chinese lanterns, but the lights that i saw did not resemble chinese lanterns whatsoever. i also was shown pictures of an aurora fighter plane - again, no resemblance at all to what i witnessed. if anything, when the object would sort of fade away, and as crazy as it sounds, it almost reminded me of the movie, predator, with that same kind of waviness and morphlike appearance.

this was such an unnerving experience for me. in some ways, i wish i had never witnessed it because i can't get the image of it out of my mind. i only wish there was some explanation for it, or that someone else has also seen something similar, which is why i'm posting my story. i had actually called the nufron hotline and the person i spoke to told me to contact the city newspaper. i was very hesitant to do that as i want to remain anonymous - i would most certainly be labeled crazy. i know how incredible this may sound, but it is the total truth. i'm still shaken up after witnessing this. i look at the sky differently now.  i know what i saw, no doubt about it.  and i can tell you, without hesitation, that this was most definitely not an airplane. the enormous size of it was no match for an airplane.  i have no idea what it was that i witnessed in the sky that night.
content.summary: Large, dark object, triangular in front/middle section, very wide across with arrowhead/chevron look, morphing in/out of sky, lights on bottom, no sound

content.detailedDescription: I'm driving late one evening around 10:30-11:00 pm. i see a shooting star fall from the sky but the star didn't burn out and there was no impact. the star/orb shot back into the sky the same way it fell. this all happened in like 2 maybe 3 seconds, very quickly. i don't know the distance between myself and star, i would guess well over a mile. this happened in between selmer and bethel spring, tennessee. this sighting occurred 06/07. disbelief and wonder were my thoughts-
content.summary: Orb fell from sky like shooting star but didn't disappear; shot back up from same way it fell.

content.detailedDescription: i was going into my house after filming the sunset so i had my camera in my hand. i felt i should turn around and just as i did there was this amazing sight in the sky. i could clearly see it with my eyes and it looked like a tiny marble following the sun down the horizon with a trail on top as it came down. i was able to take pictures for about three minutes and i put the pictures into a video as well as attaching all the original untouched images in the description in case anyone wants a closer look. in the original images you can see debris coming down in the trail. it was amazing and i have been feeling joy since seeing it.
content.summary: Just as the sun went below the horizon i saw an intense, bright, pinkish sphere following the sun down the horizon.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my front porch approx. 9:15 this evening. i was listening to music, watching the planes fly by, just looking at the stars. i saw a bright white light fly over (west to  east). it was a triangular shape(or at least appeared to be.), and was flying about the speed of a low flying airplane, maybe a little slower. the approx. size of jupiter or maybe mercury at sunset. there were no blinking lights i could see. in a very subtle way the object changed direction to south east, (it headed approx. 45 degree angle from its original flight path). as it changed direction, it accelerated, and appeared to climb, heading toward a plane flying by. in a matter of seconds, it was gone. it appeared to climb because it got smaller in size and dimmer. this whole event lasted less than 30 seconds. i have been seeing lights like this for years...Would like to know what they are!
content.summary: Observed bright light fly over accelerated out of sight

content.detailedDescription: I was camping with a friend of mine. we were very high in the mountains of the rockies climbing a peak called mummy mountain. at sunset we pitched a tent about 500 feet from the summit of the mountain.  at about midnight or 1 o'clock in the morning i woke up to use the bathroom i noticed there was a flashlight walking down from the summit towards us so i woke up my friend and i said there is someone coming down the mountain. we were nervous because we were way off the trail and i did not have a backcountry permit so i said it must be a ranger somehow he knows we're camping up here now we're going to get a fine. so my friend and i watch this light which looked just like a flashlight and it came down towards us from the mountain and when it got about a hundred feet from us it stopped then as we watched this flashlight what appeared to be a flashlight went straight up from the ground vertically into the air and we watch this thing fly out of sight. it was just a white circular orb look exactly like a person carrying a flashlight but we couldn't see the person we only saw this light. it was probably about three or four feet off the ground and we were astonished as we watch this like take off vertically go straight up in the air and disappear out of sight. after we saw that we were terrified and we got back in their tent and we felt like we had been drugged. we couldn't really speak correctly everything was hazy and it really felt like we had been taking sleeping pills for some type of drug that made us very drowsy and not able to think clearly. i think we fell into a deep sleep and then at about 8 o'clock in the morning it started raining and hailing so we started down the mountain to get out of the storm. as we were going down the mountains we ran into these men there were 4 of them on horseback in camouflage army fatigues and they were following us on their horses. they followed us for about two miles and they stayed about 100 or 200 feet behind us after about 1 hour of them following us one of them rolled up to us and you said how are you how are you guys doing, are you guys okay? we say yes we're fine only follow us for about another hour until we reached the bottom of the trail. it took us about 6 hours from the bottom of the trail to get to my car and when we got in my car the radio would not turn off. the radio in my car was randomly switching stations. we drove about a half an hour down the mountain and went to a gas station to get gas but none of the pumps would work in there was no electricity so we went across the street to wendy to try to get some food and the doors were locked and there was a note scrawled onto a napkin that was hanging in the front window of the door of wendy sorry we're closed and we can look inside and we saw some employees in there it look like they were hiding from us. when we got back home my friend noticed he had a very strange diamond shape my friend noticed very strange diamond shaped depression in the skin of his right shoulder and as we started talking about the events he said he had a dream that night that the aliens had taken a chunk out of his arm. more time to pass by the more he seemed to think that's something actually did happen and he believes that the aliens came down and took something out of his arm. i wanted to report this a long time ago but everybody we talk to thought we made it up. the only thing i saw was that flashlight looking object go straight up into the air and my radio wouldn't turn off in my car and the nearest town had no electricity but the funny thing is ever since that happened every time i'm driving with my friend and we go under a streetlight the street lights will turn off just as we passed under each of them and this happens to this day all the time don't know if there's more to the story or not but it was definitely a very strange experience and my friend seems to have like psychological problem is from this he's terrified of us all isn't everytime we talk about it he almost cries but it didn't really affect me that way i just thought it was very strange. the one thing that is really strange though is that when he and i are together and we're walking or driving every street light will pass will turn off as we pass it
content.summary: Ufo and strange events following in the backcountry of rockies, on mummy mountain

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from work at 8:16pm, i had crossed the dumbarton bridge and was heading north on paseo padre in fremont ca at about 50mph when i got the urge to take a picture of the sunset in the west to my left. as i continued driving, i rolled down the window and snapped a few pics with my iphone and forgot about it until the next morning.
when i saw the pictures, upon first glance, i thought that the yellowish, solid, half-circles were simply lens flares. however, i have never seen half circles as lens flares, they are always solid shapes. also, the image appears to move in ways that don't correspond to lens flares from image to image. in all the photos i see online with lens flares, i have never seen a half circle or half of a solid shape. my lens was clean with no water or streaks.
in some of the photos it does appear to be simply a lens flare. however, the shape and placement just don't add up so i have decided to let you decide for yourself.
content.summary: Took pictures of the sunset and later saw half circles that don't quite match up with lens flares

content.detailedDescription: #1 i was bikeing at the front of where i live near the main street. #2i herd it a roaring loud burning growling noise.#3maby a piece of space trash falling.Im still not shure what it was considering how it floated down on the slower side. ?Which still is still puzzling to me till this day.#4the object description was a charcol black grayish exterior with some light gray smoke surrounding it with orange flame inside due to fire heat.Which i felt the warmth.And was able to hear it.#5to decsribe my feelings was i immidatly looked around for any other possable eye witnesses but . once i looked around and there were only a few passing cars in the street that day but it aws obvious that no body has seen what i had seen.I also felt not safe after the event like i just wanted to go into my house to saty indoors where i could feel safe.What i had witness i knew wasnt a normal every day thing. may once in a life time. #6 the object passed onto a roof building , so i was nt able to see it land, untill years later i tried to view it from google earth above.I was glad to see a blurrd image via googl earth how ever me bieng an avrage person of avrage statis i just wouldnt fell right asking the owner permission i i can go on his roof, im not certified to take samples.There could possably be radiation? its a big reddish ploom the size of a sports utility veicle that i seen from a google eath imagle. it matches up in my opionion beacause when i seen it fallining in mid air it was about the size of a volts waggon bettle the older module.Id like to say thank you for taking the  time out in reading.
content.summary: I herd a growling or  sound up above aproaching near from where i was standing,so i immidatly look up at that moment i kind of froze because i seen what looked like a  hallowd out slow floating bolder on fire fell from abuv strong heat i felt and herd.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my parent’s house visiting and was hanging out in the backyard when suddenly i noticed up in the sky towards the east and about 500-600 ft. up, a very sparkly, shiny object flipping around in the breeze. i could not make out what it was, but it appeared to be elongated and had colorful blinking lights. i then noticed directly above my head floating at a higher altitude, another one, also blinking. both objects did not appear to be going anywhere - other than just sitting up in the sky flipping around.

i called to my mother to come outside and see it, but she was hesitant because she had stuff on the stove; so i had to physically lead her out to see the shiny objects. after a few minutes of watching, snapping photos and video from my phone, and still not being able to ascertain exactly what the objects were, i asked my mom if i could use her bird-watching binoculars to better make out the shape and to see what was causing all of the flickering and reflective light bouncing off of it.

i looked at the object through the binoculars, and could easily make out that it was some kind of fancy, high tech, weather balloon! it had an odd shaped balloon like shape on the top and what looked like a yellow or white light attached to the very top of the balloon part. the balloon was very shiny and reflective and appeared silver with an orange-ish shine to it. it also had a long line hanging from it that fishtailed in the breeze. attached to that, was a shiny canister or cylinder shaped object. the cylinder reminded me of a giant silver coffee can with its label stripped off of it. the cylinder also had red and blue blinking lights on it. 

my mom went in to finish dinner and i decided to go to the front yard where my dad was working to show it to him. i lost track of the other balloon over head, but spotted the lower altitude one, which had drifted slightly more east and a bit higher. my dad and i watched it for a few minutes discussing it (we used to launch homemade hot air balloons in a nearby park many, many years ago). 

then, as i was viewing the balloon through the binoculars and my dad was just watching it with his eyes – he had his glasses on, i suddenly saw a very bright white ball approaching it from behind, coming up fast. the bright ball approached not in a straight line, but in a very slight  “s” curve. then it slowed down, appearing to keep a respectful distance from the balloon, then flew half way around the balloon and slowed down again hovering next to it. as this was happening, i hear my dad say; “i’m having trouble figuring out which one to look at, but one of them is flying around the other kind of sporadically- it keeps moving!”. i say to my dad, while looking through the binoculars; “no, one is the balloon, and that is a ball of light flying around it! are you seeing what i’m seeing?!” (the white ball of light was moving around the balloon in a way that reminded me of the way a humming bird hovers when it’s checking out flowers!) my dad then replied; “yes, i see it!” i lowered the binoculars and tried to hand them to my dad, but he said he could see both objects just fine without the binoculars!

i looked back up at the objects through the binoculars to re-focus on the balloon and ball of light, but as i did, the ball of light took off over the direction of our heads - and the balloon was still rising and getting harder to see. just then, my mother called us in for dinner, so we both returned to the house. as we were walking in i said to my dad: “what do you think that ball of light was that was flying around the balloon?” he replied; “i don’t know, but it sure seemed “other worldly” and it seemed to be checking it out (the balloon) just like we were!”

of course, i didn’t get pictures or video of the white ball of light; i just never expected to see anything other than a balloon! (i have video and pictures of the balloon only, but instead, included a sketch with this report illustrating what we saw when the white ball appeared).

in conclusion, my dad and i were commenting later that if someone had seen those giant weather or meteorology balloons with the blue and red blinking lights at night time, and with the light on top, they would have perhaps thought that they were seeing ufos! but in any case, we cannot explain the white ball of light that seemed to be checking out the weather balloon along with us!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Large white ball checks out weather balloon

content.detailedDescription: I was sound asleep in my bed. i was literally pulled out of a deep sleep by a venucian by the name of donn thor. i do not know what his means of travel were. as i was pulled out of sleep, he was partially turned to the side towards my drafting table as i could feel a force pull me up to a sitting position in bed. normally i would of reacted to the presence of someone being in my home uninvited but, i had no feeling of alarm or danger or being harmed. when he spoke his mouth didnt move but, i could hear his voice in my mind. as i was initially brought out of sleep, he was just replacing the lid on the copy paper box that held a recently finished volume of songs and poems that was sitting to the left of my type writer on the drafting table. after he replaced the lid he turned and faced me. what i heard spoken to me in my mind was, "these are very good". he then smiled, reached back over and grasped an envelope that was sitting on top of the type writer and placed on the seat of my office chair and then i heard his voice once again in my mind say, "this is to let you know that you did not dream or imagine this". with that said he once again smiled and i felt this force, best described as the opposite poles of two magnets pushing against one another force me back down into the bed, forcing my eyes closed although i was still wide awake. i assume at that time he left. for at least the next three or more hours i laid there fully awake but, unable to open my eyes or move any part of my body. i struggled during that entire time to open my eyes and to move. i finally managed after great effort to open my eyes and sit back up in bed. as soon as i did, i could see the envelope on the chair in the exact position that he had placed it. let me point out that the office chair, not a large one, was two or three feet from the drafting table. so i had ruled out the possibility that it had slid off the type writer onto the chair at some time during the night.
content.summary: I had a face to face visitation with a venucian by the name of donn thor in my b/room

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was on a passenger bus and i was watching a movie on television bus, the time was approximately 8:20 am
2. my head turned to look out the bus window, was as if something will control my mind and my gaze went to where the object directly, mi gaze towards that ball
3. when i saw that ball does not react, then i thought he was obsessed and so i saw that ball, i then returned my gaze to bus television, thought i'd ask the passenger behind me did not see but if that ball i thought i would be all passengers like crazy, i looked through the glass window and that ball did not move near mirador de manzanillo
4. that was a ball or sphere of a color as oxidized copper, not moving, motionless was in the air, do not had any brand, it was about 53 degrees elevation and estimated that one kilometer away from me position.
5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions during and after seeing the object.
5. i was watching that ball and felt privileged and happy why that wanted me to see, this event confirmed my belief in ufos, it was the answer to my need to confirm the existence of something extraordinary in what i have believed since i was little.
6. the bus turned slightly to the left, to get to a curve that an object began to reflect light, which i force myself to squint my eyes, i thought it reflected the sunlight in what i assumed was metallic, when the bus left that left hander lost sight of that object and can no longer saw him.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
1. yo estaba en un autobús de pasajeros y yo estaba viendo una película en la televisión bus, la hora era las 8:20 am aproximadamente
2. mi cabeza se giro para mirar por la ventana del autobus , fue como si algo controlara mi mente y mi mirada fue directamente hacia donde estaba el objeto , mi mirada fue directa hacia esa bola
3.Cuando yo vi esa bola no reaccione , despues pense que estaba obsesionado y por eso yo veia esa bola , entonces yo regrese mi mirada hacia la television del autobus , pense en preguntar al pasajero que estaba detras de mi pero si el no viese aquella bola yo pense que me verian todos los pasajeros como un loco,yo volvi a mirar atraves del cristal de la ventana y aquella bola seguia sin moverse cerca del mirador de manzanillo
4. aquello era una bola o esfera de un color como el cobre oxidado , no se movia , estaba inmovil en el aire , no tenia ninguna marca , estaba como a 53 grados de elevacion y calculo que a un kilometro de distancia de mi posicion.
5. yo estaba viendo aquella bola y yo me senti privilegiado y feliz por que aquello quiso que yo lo viera , este suceso confirmo mi creencia en los ovnis , fue la respuesta a mi necesidad de confirmar la existencia de algo extraordinario en lo que he creido desde que yo era pequeño .
6. el autobus giro ligeramente hacia la izquierda , al llegar a una curva aquel objeto comenzo a reflejar una luz , que me obligo a entrecerrar mis parpados  , yo crei que reflejaba la luz del sol por lo que supuse que era metalico , cuando el autobus salio de aquella curva a la izquierda perdi de vista aquel objeto y ya no volvi a verlo.
content.summary: It was a sphere or ball , as on the history channel but rusty copper color

content.detailedDescription:
On june 11, 2015 at approximately 9:30 p.M., i went out onto my front porch to get some fresh air and look at the stars like i do most every night.  i sat on my porch step, which faces north and looks out over the lake, driveway and trees.  we live on 150 acres and sit up off the road on a hill.  our driveway is narrow, gravel and .09 miles long.  you can’t see most of it because there are woods on both sides. when i look out at night all i can see when i face this way are the silhouettes of the trees against the sky. 

i had been sitting just a few minutes when i noticed a soft white glow at the back of the tree line straight down the middle of the driveway.  to me it appeared as if it would be coming from where our driveway met the road.  it had to be powerful and tall for me to be able to see from our house though because you never see anything from the road from the house we are just to high up.  i thought maybe it could be a big utility vehicle working on the road because there are parts of many of the gravel roads in the area that are washing away from all of the rain.  i watched for a moment and then it appeared to me that it was a bit closer.  i decided that i should come in the house and put on shoes in case someone came up and needed to talk to me.  i watched the front window while i was putting on my shoes to see if i noticed lights coming up the driveway but i didn’t notice any.

using caution because i’m home alone, i slowly opened the door and peeked out to see if there was anyone outside.  there was not.  so i walked over to my spot again on the step and sat down.  i don’t remember if i saw the glow, but the next thing i saw was a huge bright white light, almost blindingly bright, and multifaceted.  it was right above the tree line, centered on the driveway.  i could not see the tree line where this light was.  it blocked everything.  then as quickly as it had burst bright white, it burst bright red but seemed to be closer when it did.  i stood up, then saw it burst to bright white, then bright red.  each time it switched to the other color it appeared to lurch forward towards me.  at this point i felt as if it were coming directly toward me and felt threatened.  i ran in the house, grabbed my cell phone and the land line and called 911 while sending a text to my husband telling him to come home from work.  i prayed that i would get through to someone before i lost power or became unable to use the phone.  i was terrified, shaking all over and had a hard time breathing.  this isn’t normal for me.  i’m the curious type, i like to check things out and don’t scare easily.  i am out here alone most of the time and have never been afraid like i was that night.  i stayed on the phone with the police dispatcher for 45 minutes until a deputy arrived.  he was wonderful and investigated the driveway and the area around the house and found nothing.  he did not make me feel silly for calling and said to call if i saw anything that made me uncomfortable again no matter how insignificant i thought it might be.  i came in the house when he left, made sure every light i had was on, surrounded myself with every weapon i had (4 of them, it just made me feel better) and sat afraid to move from the spot i was in, for the next 2 ½ hours until my husband got home.

i’m not the best judge of distance but before writing this i went and looked where i saw this happen to give you my best guess at the distance it traveled.  i did this in the daylight and with help from my husband.  starting with the glow i saw first, it would have been just under a mile from my front step, at the end of the driveway coming from below the tree line.  in my estimation the first burst of bright white light was around the halfway point so it would have been about half a mile from my house.  i pointed to where i saw the last burst of light, which was red and asked my husband to tell me how far from me.  he has a spot marked in that area to sight in gun; it is 200 yards from the house.  he said where i was pointing would be about 230 yards from my front door.
content.summary: Saw soft glow apx 1 mile away, next saw huge bright white light appear closer at 1/2 mile from me.  it changed to red seemed closer, turned white then red and was about 230 yards from me when i ran inside.

content.detailedDescription:
My second abduction experience took place in my home shortly after the first one in fall creek falls tennessee.  it was still the fall of 1973 and was either late october or early november.   that night my family had gone to a near by country club for dinner and i had kept a lot of the crackers from the table and placed them on a shelf in my room.   at this age i was afraid to go to sleep with the doors closed and so i had my parents keep the door open after they tucked me in for bed. 

i woke up later that night with a craving to eat the crackers i had saved and placed on a shelf in my room.  the lamp beside my bed was either on or i turned it on.   but my room was lit with the light from the hallway and from the light in my room.  i sat on the floor next to the shelf and began to open up the crackers, but i was having trouble taking off the plastic wrapper.  then i felt something very strange. 

the first sensation was a feeling like heat on my back.  then i heard a pulsing humming sound.  i looked up and could see a shadow on my door from someone in the hallway.  the sensations then intensified and i became afraid.  i ran back to my bed and curled up in a ball and closed my eyes.  my next thought was "oh i should have covered myself with my blanket."   i then felt fingers touching me and the pulsing humming sound was very loud.   then the sensation quickly stopped.  i opened my eyes and looked around an empty room. 

i cautiously went to the doorway to my room and looked in the hallway.  it was empty.  so i went across the hall to my parents dark room.  it was lit from the light from the hallway and from some dull orange light from a clock on a table closest to the door on my mother's side of the bed.  it was very dark towards my father's side of the bed and i was too scared to go over there.  so i shook my mom whispering "mom.  mom.  wake up."   she would not wake up.   then i felt again that heat sensation on my back, and i could hear the same pulsing humming sound.   i curled up on the floor.  this time i kept my eyes open.  i looked over at a dresser with a mirror on top, and observed a small figure come out of the wall.  it looked greyish in the shadows and i could see it had a large head and big black eyes.   i then closed my eyes but not before i saw some feet move close to me.  then i felt fingers touching me again.  they reached around my head.  one of the fingers slipped into my mouth and i then bit down on it as hard as i could.   i recall it was soft and not like my own fingers.   it had a spongy rubbery texture to it.  i then blacked out.     

the next morning i was still in my parents room.  i then yelled "there was a grey tickle monster in my room!"  i would not go back into my room till my dad looked all around.  the whole experience was terrifying for me.   then my parents said i had to get ready for school. 

i think in part i remember this experience so well from so long ago is because i told it over and over beginning that morning to other children in the car pool on the way to pre-school.   there were three other children with me in the car.  two of them did not believe my story, but the third little girl said she knew what i was talking about.  she lived across the street from me.
content.summary: Grey alien in my home

content.detailedDescription:
Came outside to smoke & saw a star that seemed to be pulsing different colors. i watched it & it wasn't moving, it was just sitting there & it was too high to be a tower light & has never been there before that i've seen. about 15 minutes later when i stood up & walked closer, i saw two other lights doing the same thing. at first i thought they were separate, but i realized as it very slowly began to move north west all three lights moved together holding the same triangle formation. the space between them was large & to my eyes never changed. it was moving very slowly. duration was two hours. about 45 minutes in i glanced north & i saw a lone object hovering about the mountain line of n salt lake city. it's lights were clearly visible. it looked from my angle to be a line of lights that were rapidly lighting up in a line, strobing across it. the lights were red, blue, yellow, green, white & in fast sequence. whereas the triangle floated west out of view slowly disappearing the lone one just disappeared. i looked down, looked up & it was gone. i tried repeatedly to get pictures and video but my phone couldn't capture what i was seeing. i tweeted about the whole event on my twitter feed as it happened if you want to read the play by play as it happened. i was tagging slc utah for others to go look. one other person seemed to have seen it as well. the day of the 15th i found another person who had posted a video (much better than mine) on youtube. you can see the pulsing lights although to my eye on that night i could see the line of lights of the one over the mountain. the triangle shape one was just a blur of pulsing color. i've since been trying to eliminate what it wasn't ie gas, weather balloons and so forth. my reaction to the sighting was that it was cool, if military they suck at hiding since the lights were bright & attention grabbing. lol watched the skies for decades now & never seen anything i could truly not reason away. that's not to say this can't be, but i can't come up with a possible known explanation.

the next night, last night between 2-4:30 am i looked again & saw 5 lighted objects scattered across the valley. one was over the mountain again as the night before but farther away. all the objects were farther & all i could see was the flashing of color. i just went to bed, no idea how they left from view. they again, to my view were hovering & would disappear from view with clouds. 2 i could see through the cloud coverage. 

the video posted on youtube of the one on the 15th can be found by googling utah ufo 15-6-15 (think that was the title). i'm sorry my photos & video are so bad. the photo on my twitter shows 3 points of light when zooming in. that's the triangle. my twitter is rikkie wells and handle is @zbanshee if you want to read the play by play. i also posted the youtube video i found. 

let me know if you have any questions & i'd suggest someone from the utah chapter go outside tonight between 2:30 & 5:30 am with a good camera. :)

best regards,
[name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Large triangle outline hovered then slowly moved west. lone shape north. next night 5 smaller lights seen across valley but farther away this time. might be out again tonight.

content.detailedDescription:
I woke up about 4:00 this morning; fed the cats; and decided to go get a newspaper and a cup of coffee.
as i was getting into my car, (about 4:35am),  when i noticed a bright light in the sky to the east. my first thought was that it was venus but it was about twice the normal size of venus. then blackness started in the center of the object and spread out until the object was gone. the whole sighting didn't last more than about eight or ten seconds with it disappearing in about 1 second. i first thought that some clouds must have passed over it so i continued to look. then i realized i could see stars and that there were were no clouds in that direction. i waited about a minute to see if it would reappear but the only other thing i saw was a streak of bright light about 3 degrees to the right of the original sighting. i took the second sighting to be a meteorite. the brightest star in the sky where i saw the phenomena was hamal but the sighting was much bigger and brighter. there was no sound.
later in the day i took a photo of the sky where i saw the phenomena and put a lens flare on it to show the approximate size and position.
content.summary: Light in the east

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was on my balcony admiring a rainbow cloud that appeared to become richer in colours of blue, yellow, green, orange, with streaks of red through the orange. as i watched it pass over the homes i noticed what appeared to be a small solid white oval object come from behind the cloud, it continued s\e than looked as if it where rising in the sky and then continued s\e in an upward assent appearing smaller as it flew away then it disappeared. i thought it could be a satellite, i've never seen anything fly so high in the sky before but it wasn't shining or reflective just solid white. it was easy to see the object once it flew out behind the cloud contrast to the blue sky.
content.summary: Solid white, oval in shape

content.detailedDescription:
On june 4  i spotted what at first looked like a star in the sky. i was a little suspicious as i was sure it was moving. i had to wait a good 2 mins before seeing it move in my direction .  

this object was travelling from south west - east ,  

another object appeared not 5 mins later, this  one came  from the south , travelled north. the exact same light formation, static bright spotlight, going over my home. 

both  lights on the objects was unwavering, a static bright light. i felt i was being watched, as if they knew i knew they were watching me. i felt very uncomfortable . it moved over the top of me and my house , there was no noise. nothing, just dead quiet . 

on 5th june , the light came back, in the exact same pattern, south west - east and another object going south - north. 


i have been filming many ufo's around my house / area  in the past 2 months.Every time i step outside at night, they are there, or i wait 5 mins and they show up.
content.summary: Bright spotlight ufo

content.detailedDescription: Me and my girlfriend were watching tv when we suddenly hear a roaring sound that increasingly got louder so we go outside and witnessed a large white light fly directly over our house with a military type jet following close behind for approximately 15 seconds then both disappeared behind some trees. about 5 minutes later we hear another roaring sound so we go back outside and witnessed a very large rectangular orange craft with 3 white lights in a straight line in front and 3 white lights in a l shape in the rear that first was flying in a straight line then suddenly made an abrupt 90 degree turn from north to the west and also was followed closely by a military type jet. when the object made the 90 degree turn, the jet  had to make a much larger turn to catch back up to it. this second sighting lasted for approximately 30 seconds. approximately 5 minutes after the second sighting we hear a third roaring sound. the third object flew directly over my house. it was 3 very bright white lights in a triangle shape approximately 30 feet between lights. the third object was also being followed by a military type jet. after approximately 15 seconds both object and jet disappeared behind trees. me and my girlfriend both witnessed all 3 crafts and all 3 jets following the objects. after the sighting we both felt kind of afraid because of how low both the objects and jets were flying.
content.summary: 3 ufos with military jets chasing each

content.detailedDescription:
I am a person who likes to photograph, this time often takes the evening sky, beautiful sunset.
at around ten o'clock this evening, my daughter asked me suddenly, dad, how can i so late there are white clouds, so i went to the window to see,
tonight the sky is very beautiful, you can see the clouds. then i took the camera from the window to outdoor the sky, and the night view of the city, we in the more than 20 floor, relatively high
i usually take a photo of a photo, so i took 18 consecutive photos.,
when i uploaded the photo to the computer, i was surprised to have a ufo in my hair, and i thought it was the plane, but i amplified it.
the picture looks for a long time, the feeling is not the plane, but the ufo. so i checked the internet and searched the site..£¨ufo total of 11 photos, but the following can only upload 10£©
content.summary: After a continuous photo shoot tonight, there are ufo
